scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd authservice && npm run dev"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd client && npm run lint" "cd authservice && npm run lint"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd client && npm run test" "cd authservice && npm run test"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "cd authservice && npm run build"
